abstract: A unique identifier for a peer device in the session.
overview:
## Discussion

The value of this property refers to a specific peer device. Your session delegate receives updates for a peer’s position in your delegate’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NISessionDelegate/session(_:didUpdate:)] implementation. To correspond the updates to an iPhone or Apple Watch among multiple peer devices with which your app interacts, compare the value of this property to the configuration’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyPeerConfiguration/peerDiscoveryToken]. For interactions with third-party accessories, compare the value of this property to the configuration’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyAccessoryConfiguration/accessoryDiscoveryToken].

Subsequent sessions with the same peer device produce a different value for this property. For user privacy, the system assigns this property a unique, random number to prevent correlation between this property and a particular device.

# discoveryToken

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for a peer device in the session.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var discoveryToken: NIDiscoveryToken { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property refers to a specific peer device. Your session delegate receives updates for a peer’s position in your delegate’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NISessionDelegate/session(_:didUpdate:)] implementation. To correspond the updates to an iPhone or Apple Watch among multiple peer devices with which your app interacts, compare the value of this property to the configuration’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyPeerConfiguration/peerDiscoveryToken]. For interactions with third-party accessories, compare the value of this property to the configuration’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyAccessoryConfiguration/accessoryDiscoveryToken].

Subsequent sessions with the same peer device produce a different value for this property. For user privacy, the system assigns this property a unique, random number to prevent correlation between this property and a particular device.
title: discoveryToken
